langsim.datatypes.neural_sixgram module¶

class NeuralSixgramTrainingData(base_dir, pipeline, module=None, additional_name=None, use_main_metadata=False, **kwargs)[source]¶

Bases: pimlico.datatypes.base.PimlicoDatatype

Prepared training data for neural sixgram model. Preparation involves extracting positive samples from the input corpus, shuffling them and drawing appropriate negative samples to match each one.

The result is a big binary file containing the training IDs in sequence. Each sample consists of 12 integers: a positive 6-gram and a negative 6-gram.

For efficiency, they’re packed as C-structs.

datatype_name = 'neural_sixgram_training_data'¶
